summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in block 91, D.T. Denny's 5th Addition, being the alley between 9th Avenue and Westlake Avenue, from Thomas Street to Harrison Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 98612 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
